hotels.name: OO Mandarina

hotels.name: Capella Ubud

hotels.name: NIHI Sumba

hotels.address: Hoba Wawi, Wanokaka, West Sumba Regency, East Nusa Tenggara, Indonesia

hotels.name: The Sanubari

hotels.longDesc: The Sanubari sits on the lesser-known Indonesian isle of Sumba, where thatched-roof villas create an idyllic soundtrack of lapping waves and rustling breezes, perfect for serene sunlounger meditations.

hotels.name: Further Hotel

hotels.name: The Sanubari

experiences.name: Canggu
experiences.desc: Trendy beach town, popular tourist hub, vibrant dining and nightlife scene
experiences.longDesc: Once a hidden gem, Canggu has become Bali's trendiest destination, though it's increasingly crowded. Perfect for those seeking excellent food, cocktail bars, and a lively beach atmosphere.
experiences.address: Canggu, Kuta Utara, Badung Regency, Bali, Indonesia

experiences.name: Tabanan
experiences.desc: Quieter alternative to crowded Canggu, local charm, less touristy vibe
experiences.longDesc: A lesser-known neighbourhood near Canggu offering authentic Balinese experiences with fewer crowds, ideal for travelers seeking a more local and tranquil island experience.
experiences.address: Tabanan, Tabanan Regency, Bali, Indonesia

experiences.name: Seseh
experiences.desc: Charming village near Canggu, authentic local atmosphere, off-the-beaten-path
experiences.longDesc: A picturesque village surrounding Canggu that offers a more authentic, less touristy Balinese experience for those looking to escape the crowded main tourist areas.
experiences.address: Seseh, Munggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali, Indonesia

experiences.name: Pererenan
experiences.desc: Emerging beach neighbourhood, quieter alternative to Canggu, growing food and drink scene
experiences.longDesc: An increasingly popular neighbourhood near Canggu offering a more relaxed atmosphere with emerging brunch spots and cocktail bars, perfect for a 48-hour escape.
experiences.address: Pererenan, Mengwi, Badung Regency, Bali, Indonesia

experiences.name: Komodo Pink Beaches
experiences.desc: Pink sand beach, scenic beauty, off-the-beaten-path destination
experiences.longDesc: A stunning pink-hued beach offering natural beauty and fewer crowds than popular Bali destinations. Perfect for photography and peaceful seaside exploration.
experiences.address: 8HV5+HPJ, Komodo, West Manggarai Regency, East Nusa Tenggara, Indonesia

experiences.name: Raja Ampat Reefs
experiences.desc: Pristine untouched reefs, world-class diving and snorkeling, exclusive marine paradise
experiences.longDesc: An exclusive marine sanctuary featuring untouched coral reefs and abundant aquatic life. Ideal for diving and snorkeling in a pristine, less-crowded tropical setting.
experiences.address: Pantai Yenanas, Yenbeser, Kec. Waigeo Sel., Kabupaten Raja Ampat, Papua Barat Daya 98482, Indonesia

experiences.name: Karoso Beach

experiences.name: Canggu

experiences.name: Ubud

a.description: From beachfront barefoot luxury in Seminyak to rainforest wellness in Ubud, this is the essential Bali journey through tropical pools, rice paddies, sacred temples, and Indonesia's most captivating island landscapes.

items.suggestedDesc: Organic farm-to-table restaurant in Ubud rice fields offering healthy Indonesian and Western dishes

items.name: Return to resort for final afternoon
Murni's Warung
items.suggestedDesc: Iconic Ubud restaurant with stunning valley views, serving Indonesian and international cuisine since 1974

items.name: Transfer to Ngurah Rai International Airport (approximately 1.5 hours)
Light lunch at airport before departure
Clear Cafe
items.suggestedDesc: Healthy vegetarian cafe in central Ubud serving organic food, fresh juices, and comfort meals

items.name: Bebek Bengil
items.suggestedDesc: Famous Ubud restaurant known for crispy duck and traditional Balinese cuisine

b.name: Islands Beyond Bali: Sumba, Komodo & Moyo (12 Days)
b.description: Escape the crowds on Indonesia's wildest islandsâ€”pristine pink beaches, untouched reefs, and luxury hideaways where the jungle meets the sea.

items.name: Tambing Restaurant
items.suggestedDesc: Beachfront dining at Cap Karoso with local Sumbanese cuisine and ocean views

items.name: Ombak Restaurant
items.suggestedDesc: Cap Karoso's signature restaurant featuring grilled seafood and Indonesian specialties

days.label: Day 2 â€” Exploring Sumba's Wild Coast

items.name: Traditional village visit and weaving demonstration
items.suggestedDesc: Visit Praijing village to see traditional Sumbanese architecture and ikat weaving

items.name: Warung Mama
items.suggestedDesc: Local family warung serving authentic Sumbanese home cooking

items.name: Nihiwatu Beach
items.suggestedDesc: Pristine white sand beach on Sumba's southwest coast, known for world-class surfing and stunning sunsets

items.name: Kamaniwa Restaurant
items.suggestedDesc: Restaurant at Cap Karoso serving fresh seafood and local Sumbanese cuisine

items.name: Weekuri Lagoon visit
items.suggestedDesc: Natural saltwater lagoon surrounded by cliffs, perfect for swimming

items.name: Picnic lunch at the lagoon
items.suggestedDesc: Gourmet picnic basket prepared by Cap Karoso

items.name: Mandorak Beach
items.suggestedDesc: Remote beach on Sumba's south coast known for dramatic rock formations and excellent horseback riding opportunities

items.name: Marosi Beach Restaurant
items.suggestedDesc: Beachfront dining at Nihi Sumba offering farm-to-table cuisine

days.label: Day 4 â€” Transit to Flores (Komodo Gateway)

items.name: Flight to Labuan Bajo, Flores (1.5 hours)
Plataran Komodo Resort & Spa
items.suggestedDesc: Luxury beachfront resort with infinity pool and private beach access in Labuan Bajo

items.name: Made in Italy
items.suggestedDesc: Waterfront Italian restaurant in Labuan Bajo with wood-fired pizza

items.name: Tree Top Restaurant
items.suggestedDesc: Treetop dining with panoramic bay views and fresh seafood

days.label: Day 5 â€” Komodo National Park Adventure

items.name: Komodo National Park
items.suggestedDesc: UNESCO World Heritage Site famous for Komodo dragons, covering several islands in eastern Indonesia

items.name: Rinca Island
items.suggestedDesc: Island in Komodo National Park with excellent Komodo dragon viewing and guided trekking trails

items.name: Onboard lunch prepared by crew
items.suggestedDesc: Fresh grilled seafood lunch served on private boat charter

items.name: Pantai Merah
items.suggestedDesc: Pink Beach on Komodo Island, famous for its coral sand and excellent snorkeling

items.name: Mediterraneo Restaurant
items.suggestedDesc: Mediterranean seafood with harbor views and excellent wine list

items.name: Early morning boat to Padar Island
Padar Island
items.suggestedDesc: Iconic island in Komodo National Park with dramatic viewpoint accessible via hiking trail

items.name: Manta Point
items.suggestedDesc: Famous dive and snorkel site in Komodo National Park for encountering manta rays

items.name: Onboard seafood lunch
items.suggestedDesc: Boat lunch with grilled fish and Indonesian sides

items.name: Pink Beach Komodo
items.suggestedDesc: One of only seven pink sand beaches in the world, located in Komodo National Park

items.name: Happy Banana
items.suggestedDesc: Casual beachfront restaurant known for fresh tuna and cold beer

days.label: Day 7 â€” Relaxation Day in Labuan Bajo

items.name: La Cucina
items.suggestedDesc: Elegant Italian restaurant with homemade pasta and harbor views

items.name: Atlantis Beach Club
items.suggestedDesc: Beachfront dining with seafood barbecue and live music

days.label: Day 8 â€” Transit to Moyo Island

items.name: Morning flight to Sumbawa Besar (1 hour)
Private boat transfer to Moyo Island (2 hours)
Late lunch at jungle dining pavilion
items.suggestedDesc: Amanwana's main dining pavilion with Indonesian and international cuisine

items.name: Afternoon beach time and tent settling
Sunset cocktails on your private deck
Beach BBQ dinner under the stars
items.suggestedDesc: Private beach barbecue with fresh seafood and romantic setting

days.label: Day 9 â€” Moyo Island Marine Reserve

items.name: Moyo Island Marine Park
items.suggestedDesc: Protected marine reserve around Moyo Island with pristine coral reefs

items.name: Beachside lunch pavilion
items.suggestedDesc: Light lunch at Amanwana's beach pavilion with salads and grilled fish

items.name: Tanjung Pasir Beach
items.suggestedDesc: Secluded beach on Moyo Island with calm waters ideal for water sports

items.name: Treetop dining experience
items.suggestedDesc: Elevated dining platform in the jungle with tasting menu

days.label: Day 10 â€” Moyo Waterfalls & Jungle Trek

items.name: Mata Jitu Waterfall
items.suggestedDesc: Stunning waterfall in Moyo Island jungle cascading into natural swimming pools

items.name: Waterfall picnic lunch
items.suggestedDesc: Gourmet picnic prepared by Amanwana served at the waterfall

items.name: Moyo Island Sunset Point
items.suggestedDesc: Scenic viewpoint on Moyo Island's western coast for sunset viewing

items.name: Indonesian rijsttafel dinner
items.suggestedDesc: Traditional Indonesian feast with multiple dishes at main pavilion

items.name: Afternoon free time at private beach
Farewell dinner on the beach

items.name: Flight to Bali or Jakarta for international connection
